$Remove NK Bug [Ferrer]
48000000 806df7a0
de000000 80008180
14000178 01010012
e0000000 80008000


CODE EXPLAINED:
48000000 806df7a0		# po = [0x806df7a0]
de000000 80008180		# if po is between 0x80000000 and 0x81800000, execute code below
14000178 01010012		# write 0x01010012 at po+0x178
e0000000 80008000
